issue.title: MAP Helper may leads to double loading js libraries
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

in  components\com_easysdi_map\helpers\easysdi_map.php

JQuery and Bootstrap may be loaded twice depending on debug enabled or not.
(because Joomla loads each script URI only once, but loads uncompressed versions in debug mode)


**Fixed versions :** 4.1.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Patched in my sandbox : .../sandboxes/asit-vd/4.0.2/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_map/src/site/helpers/easysdi_map.php
